# Jilo.ai

> Jilo.ai is a free AI tool directory that helps users discover, compare, and choose the best AI tools for their needs. Updated daily with expert reviews across 8+ categories.

## Core Value

Jilo.ai curates 70+ AI tools organized by real use cases (writing, coding, design, video, business), providing independent expert reviews, side-by-side comparisons, and alternative recommendations ‚Äî all completely free with no registration required.

## Key Stats

- 70+ curated AI tools
- 8+ categories (Writing, Coding, Design, Video, Business, Marketing, etc.)
- Daily updates with new tools and reviews
- Bilingual support: English and Chinese
- 10K+ active users

## Main Sections

- [AI Tools Directory](https://jilo.ai/en/tools): Browse all AI tools by category, pricing, and use case
- [Tool Comparisons](https://jilo.ai/en/compare): Side-by-side comparisons of popular AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT vs DeepSeek, Cursor vs Copilot)
- [AI Tool Alternatives](https://jilo.ai/en/alternatives): Find alternatives to popular AI tools
- [Best AI Tools](https://jilo.ai/en/best): Curated lists of best AI tools by category
- [In-Depth Reviews](https://jilo.ai/en/reviews): Expert reviews and analysis of AI tools
- [AI News](https://jilo.ai/en/news): Latest AI industry news and updates
- [AI Deals](https://jilo.ai/en/deals): Current deals and discounts on AI tools
- [Weekly Digest](https://jilo.ai/en/weekly): Weekly roundup of AI tool trends
